name: 99 Jelly Beans, Candy Smash Match 3
description:
*** App Store What's Hot! ***
99 Jelly Beans brings our favorite bean variety to life with physics and visuals that are fun and dynamic. Jelly beans fall, tumble and get stuck just like in a jelly bean jar. Each jelly bean is rendered in full 3D, with nearly every flavor represented, and colors change each new game. How fun is that! 99 Jelly Beans is an iOS exclusive, fast, fun and addictive.

Instructions:
Tap a jelly bean to match at least three of the same color, but get as many as you can together for bigger scores and a chance to find the hidden present. You've only got 99 Jelly Beans, so use them wisely, strategy is key to maximum scores.

It's time to start tapping ... 99 Jelly Beans!

Highlights:
Realistic jelly bean physics.
Shootout w/Friends.
HD jelly bean graphics.
Sequential matching.
Completely freeform packing.
Hidden present bonus.
Perfect game bonus.
New colors every game.
Dramatic lighting effects.
Multiple difficulty levels.
High score tracker.
Game Statistics.
